name: Moon Race
description:
Feel the Fever of the Moon Race. Land your rover on the moon as fast as possible and, of course, as safe as possible.

If you want to feel the atmosphere of the late 60s and take part in the race to "win" the moon, then we have some great news for you: For just some cents you can rewrite history ... over and over again!

Tap and hold your finger on the screen to employ your thrusters. The location of your finger determines the power and angle of your thrusters. Monitor the distance to the surface and try to land safely in as few attempts and as quickly as possible.

In Moon Race, your job will be that of landing your rover on the moon as fast as possible and, of course, as safe as possible. Things won't always be easy as you will have all sorts of obstacles to overcome, but with time comes skill and you will surely get what it takes to become a complete lander and win the Moon Race.

"Only a lunar-tic wouldn't download this to their iOS device." - Games Press

Hone up your skills at landing that moon module, enjoy the retro black & white visuals and try to get on the top of the two leadearboards of the game.

Controls:
Touch and move to control the throttle.
Wipe left and right at the same time to steer.
Move around the Lunar Modul to fly in different angles.
Share your best landings with your friends.

Features:
- Play 118 lunar missions
- Original black-and-white TV graphics
- Optimized 3D graphics for iPhone and iPad
- Easy and intuitive controls
- Presented in English and German
- „Console-style“ menus and info
- Achievements and Leaderboards for score and fly time
- No ads, no extra costs



Thank you for playing Flauchers Finest games!
